comments: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = 0. - _Mitch Harris_, Jun 09 20051 + (-1)^n-th prime. - _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Oct 29 2009
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

prog: (Haskell)a000038 n = 2 * a000007 n -- _James Spahlinger_, Oct 08 2012(PARI) a(n)=if(n,0,2) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 09 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
